text: In the Distance is a 2017 novel by writer and professor Hernán Diaz. The novel was a finalist for the PEN/Faulkner Award for Fiction and for the Pulitzer Prize. The novel took six years to write. Carys Davies, writing for The Guardian, referred to the novel as a "thrilling narrative, full of twists and turns". ==References== Category:2017 American novels Category:2017 debut novels
title: In the Distance
